TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsToken extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 代表可辨識的單字或短片語。

span.span: Represents a word or short phrase that can be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的成員類別，您可以指定三種形式的文字：表單表單，並自訂字。Using the members of the class, you can specify three forms of a word: the form, the form, and a custom for the word. 如果多個字組會儲存在單一物件，每個會被視為不同的語彙基元於內部，並在結果中。If multiple words are stored in a single object, each is treated as a different token internally and in the result. 此類別代表`token`World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 所定義的項目[語音辨識文法規格 (SRGS) 1.0 版。](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。This class represents the `token` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 如需 SRGS`token`項目和 System.Speech，其支援的詳細資料請參閱[k 元素](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632)。For information about the SRGS `token` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [token Element](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string text) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 新 類別執行個體的文字。

span.span: The text of the new class instance.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定要辨識的文字。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the text to be recognized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立物件，其屬性的值一開始設定`text`參數。Creates a object whose property is set initially to the value of the `text` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Display { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Display : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定要讀出之文字的顯示表單。

span.span: Gets or sets the display form of the text to be spoken.

value.span: 語彙基元應該要有的顯示方式的表示法。

span.span: A representation of the token as it should be displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們通常代表相同的值，雖然可能會不同於表單構成的單字或片語中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，顯示表單可能的首字母縮寫，例如 「 美國 」，會讀出的文字時，要套用，是 「 美國 」。For example, the display form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 嘗試要將空字串指派給 。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

summary.span: 取得或設定用來定義語彙基元發音的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string that defines the pronunciation for the token.

value.span: 傳回字串，包含來自 中所指定語音字母的音素。

span.span: Returns a string containing phones from the phonetic alphabet specified in .
An attempt is made to set to .

summary.span: 取得或設定應讀出之文字的書寫形式。

span.span: Gets or sets the written form of the word that should be spoken.

value.span: 包含在 類別執行個體中的文字。

span.span: The text contained within the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它們通常代表相同的值，雖然可能會不同於表單構成的單字或片語中。Although they typically represent the same value, the form may be different than the form for a word or phrase in a . 例如，表單可能的首字母縮寫，例如 「 美國 」，會讀出的文字時，要套用，是 「 美國 」。For example, the form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the applies, is "United States of America". 預設值為屬性為空字串:""。The default value for the property is an empty string—"".

span.span: An attempt is made to set to .

exception.span: 嘗試要將空字串指派給 。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign an empty string to .

exception.span: 嘗試要將包含引號 (') 的字串指派給 。

span.span: An attempt is made to assign a string that contains a quotation mark (") to .
